description: |
  We are an international team of scientists building a platform for the hosting of machine learning competitions to drive forward discoveries in high energy physics and cosmology. The collaboration includes LBNL, the University of Washington, and ChaLearn, a non-profit that organizes challenges to stimulate research in machine learning.
